Description: Dedicated server for HP Multiplayer mod - allows multiple players to play House Party together
Author: l0cks-acab

Dependencies.Name: Mono Runtime
Dependencies.Description: Required for Linux. Install: sudo apt-get install mono-complete

Notes: This server requires the HP Multiplayer mod to be installed on client machines
On Linux, ensure Mono runtime is installed: sudo apt-get install mono-complete
Default port is 7777 (UDP). Configure firewall accordingly.
Server supports up to 16 players by default (configurable)
